question: Where did this idea originate from
Provide a descriptive heading or caption to your Kaizen
Who is the Kaizen owner
Who are the team members
Name of the project for which Kaizen is performed
Name of the department under the project
Select the start date from which this kaizen was planned
Select the end date on which this kaizen was implemented and executed
What is your improvement or problem statement? Make sure your answer describes what when and why
What is your primary parameter that you wish to work on
What is your secondary parameter that you wish to work on
Is there any negatively impacted parameters in this process
What tools and techniques have you used for analysis and solution to determine aspects of improvement and improvement actions
Mention the aspect that you ned to work upon to bring the improvement
Mention the improvement action would you take to improve the aspect given. Improvement action may result in one or more task to be implemented

For a given improvement task above what is your solution task? The solution needs to be identified for implementation and recorded here. Improvement action may result in one or more tasks to be implemented
Write the name of the person responsible for implementing the task
What is the actual implemented date?
What was the actual achievement vs target planned in planning stage?
Provide the outcome of your planned improvement solution task
What did you do differently?
What were the lessons learnt? how did you benefit from the improvement?
How did your client benefit from the improvement?
How did your team/organization benefit from the improvement?
Were you able to apply the improvement?
Did you do anything more than what you had planned?
What were the key differentiators?
What are the take aways?
